title: Bug 137464: Data preview not refreshing after applying filter on a Join dataset in chart editor's select data page
OB: When applying a filter on a Join dataset in the chart editor's select data page, the data preview does not refresh. After applying the filter, the data preview remains unchanged, even though the filter has an effect.
EB: The data preview should refresh after setting a filter on a Join dataset in the chart editor's select data page.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Open the attached file.
2. Create a chart and choose the select data page.
3. Use the Join dataset and set the X and Y series.
4. Apply a filter to a specific condition.
